messages.title: A fresh start for Britain
messages.content: We deserve better. You can vote for the positive change we need.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Triple education budget, cut class sizes, qualified teachers.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering for you and your family
keyPolicies.policyDescription: More jobs, better hospitals and schools, safer roads, and the new station at Chesterton.
Championed '20's Plenty' to make residential streets safer, pushed to cut energy waste, and successfully fought the County's proposed waste incinerator.
Fights against inappropriate development without proper infrastructure.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Julian can beat Labour here.

issues.economy: More jobs, better hospitals and schools, safer roads.
issues.education: Triple education budget, cut class sizes, qualified teachers.
issues.environment: Championed '20's Plenty' to make residential streets safer, pushed to cut energy waste, and successfully fought the County's proposed waste incinerator.
issues.health: Securing tomorrow's NHS; better local health services like the proposed new Addenbrooke's site.

housing.content: Fights against inappropriate development without proper infrastructure.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Cambridge for 20 years, first coming here to study at the University. I love Cambridge, with all its amazing diversity and talent.

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured millions in transport funding, delivered a new station at Chesterton, and secured £1 billion for the local NHS.

contactInformation.address: Cambridge Liberal Democrats, 16 Signet Court, Swann's Road, Cambridge, CB5 8LA

images.caption: Julian Huppert standing, interacting with various constituents, and in different locations around Cambridge.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes that Julian has a track record of action and that he is the clear choice to deliver positive change for Cambridge. It also includes a tactical voting message suggesting he is the only candidate who can beat Labour in the area.
